You are an answer-extraction expert. You.response: The focus of Amnesty International's campaign is the global death penalty.
Number of executions worldwide has gone down by almost 22% compared with 2013, but death sentences up by 28%.
The report will provide an overview of the global death penalty.
The goal of the report is to catalog encouraging signs and setbacks in the global death penalty, and to highlight the use of the threat of terrorism by governments to advance executions.
The focus of Amnesty International's campaign is the use of the death penalty in an attempt to tackle real or imaginary threats to state security and public safety.

Decrease in the number of executions worldwide, with at least 22% fewer executions in 2014 compared to 2013. Sub-Saharan Africa saw a 28% fall in reported cases, and executions recorded in the Middle East and North Africa were down 23% compared to 2013.
the use of state-sanctioned killing as a punitive measure across the globe
The goal of the report is to highlight the global use of state-sanctioned killing as a punitive measure and to advocate for the abolition of capital punishment.
